fields.text: Welcome to Twitch, the live streaming video platform for gaming and entertainment in San Francisco.
If you’re a streamer needing assistance, press '[INDEX]'.
For technical support with your stream or broadcasting software, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to Twitch streamer technical support.
For questions about monetization, subscriptions, and partnerships, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to our partnerships and monetization team.
If you are a viewer and need assistance, press '[INDEX]'.
For account, login, and password issues, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to account support.
To report content, file a safety concern, or for moderation help, press '[INDEX]'.
Please hold while we connect you to content moderation and safety support.
